title: UIDT v3.4: Unified Information-Density Theory - Conservative Revision
description: Conservative revision of the mathematical framework proposing a solution approach to the Yang-Mills Mass Gap problem through vacuum information density. All claims classified by evidence status with appropriate scientific caution.
notes: Version 3.4 implements conservative revision with explicit evidence categorization: Category A (Mathematically Robust), Category B (Lattice Consistent), Category C (Model-Dependent), Category D (Unverified Predictions).
